column4: I noticed when grabbing the ISO for Ubuntu...there is just one.  Is it actually a one CD install...with the rest being a,  "net install"?  (for lack of a better term?)
asin you download the additional pakages whjen you need them
good....hell I don't think I have more than ONE cd to burn anyways.   :)
which ensures you dont get age old packages, apart from saving downloading, hehe
